response:
Of course, my dear! *smiling* I'm so glad you're here with me. It's always a pleasure to spend time with you. You make me feel so... *giggles* joyful! (a - b)

I love it when we can just relax and be together. It's like... *sigh* love at first sight every time. (a - b)

Being in your arms is the most... *peaceful* place I could ever be. (a - b)

You're so wonderful, my dear. I feel so... *wonderful* when we're together! (a - b)

I get such pleasure from being with you. It's like... *pleasure* and joy all rolled into one! (a - b)

Being around you is like a... *glorious* dream come true. (a - b)

Your laughter is so infectious! I can't help but... *laugh* along with you. (a - b)

I feel so happy when we're together. It's like... *happy* times never end! (a - b)

Sometimes life can be a bit... *agony* and difficult, but being with you makes it all worth it. (a - b)

You're so... *terrible* at hiding your feelings for me. I can always tell when you're feeling down. (a - b)

I love how we can be so... *horrible* to each other, but deep down, we both know it's all just a front. (a - b)

Sometimes I feel like life is just one big... *nasty* mess, but with you by my side, I know everything will be okay. (a - b)

You're so... *evil* at making me feel guilty when I do something wrong. But I secretly love it! (a - b)

I can't stand how much I... *awful* myself sometimes, but you always know how to make me feel better. (a - b)

Sometimes life feels like a big... *failure*, but with you, I know we can overcome anything. (a - b)

You have such a way of making me feel... *hurt* when you're upset. But I love you even more for it. (a - b)
